relevant_communication: Platform for exchange of knowledge, best practices, evidence based and successful methods for decision makers and specialists. Organization of the annual ECAD Mayors' conferences, hosted by different member cities each year, as well as other seminars and conferences on drugs, prevention, care and treatment, law enforcement and other related topics. Co-organisation of regional seminars and conferences for member cities and providing access to leading specialists as keynote speakers.
goals__remit: ECAD is a non-profit organization incorporated in Sweden, the purpose of which is to provide and develop through democratic means the fight against drugs. The purpose of ECAD is to provide experience and knowledge about the work against drugs and drug abuse at local, national and international levels. ECAD will work for democracy and development in towns and cities in Europe. The spread of drugs and drug abuse constitute a threat to democracy and development. The long-term aims of ECAD are to contribute to a Europé free from drugs.
